channel.title: Comments on: Niggy Tardust and the Leechers from Mars

item.title: By: blak vapor
item.dc:creator: blak vapor
item.description: Interesting take on it all. Many good points, I like it. I download stuff to find stuff I like enough to pursue at greater lengths. The Niggy I went out and ought the CD, all I would say is it would be nice if people could at least "donate', not many musicians out of the planet get the backing or the means to go out and tour their stuff, so does that mean unless you 'make it' you don't deserve to be paid for the product you present?
item.content:encoded:
Interesting take on it all. Many good points, I like it. I download stuff to find stuff I like enough to pursue at greater lengths.
The Niggy I went out and ought the CD, all I would say is it would be nice if people could at least “donate’, not many musicians out of the planet get the backing or the means to go out and tour their stuff, so does that mean unless you ‘make it’ you don’t deserve to be paid for the product you present?
